title: Falling from ladders
creator_credit: Svenska filminstitutet, ONF | NFB, John Kemeny, Tom Daly, Joseph Koenig and Mort Ransen
brief_description: Simply by putting about twenty Swedish men, women and young people in front of his camera and having them read aloud from the Statistical Year Book, filmmaker Mort Ransen has recorded a wide range of impressions of Sweden’s economic and social existence. Quotations vary from the whole gamut of exports and imports, marriages formed or dissolved, to the number of people who fall from ladders annually.
